body.p: XML markup tables, such as the markup table IBMXML, are enabled to perform a XML-document preview. In order to preview the XML document, the steps described below should be followed. XML documents require a style sheet (*.XSL) document in order to be properly displayed. Either import the XSL document into the folder containing the XML documents to be translated and analyze it in order to be used by the preview function, or select your own XSL file from a directory on the hard disk drive.
